member.name: T:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController
member.summary: API controller for managing Documents.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.#ctor(Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentsController class
member.param: An instance of IDocumentRepository to handle the Documents
An instance of IMapper to map between Document entities and models

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocuments
member.summary: Returns a list of documents.
member.returns: A list of DocumentGetResponseModel, or No Content if no document is found.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the document with the specified id.
member.returns: The DocumentGetResponseModel with the specified id, or NotFound if the document is not found.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PatchDocument(System.Guid,Lease.API.Models.Document.DocumentPatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the document with the specified id.
member.param: The id of the document to update.
The DocumentPatchRequestModel with the updated values.
member.returns: The DocumentPatchResponseModel with the updated values, or NotFound if the document is not found.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PostDocument(Lease.API.Models.Document.DocumentPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new document.
member.param: The DocumentPostRequestModel with the values for the new document.
member.returns: The DocumentPostResponseModel for the newly created document.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.DeleteDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Document by ID
member.param: The ID of the Document to delete
member.returns: NoContent if the Document is successfully deleted, NotFound if the Document is not found

member.name: T:Lease.API.Data.Repository.DocumentRepository
member.summary: Implementation of the IDocumentRepository interface for managing Document entities in the database.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.DocumentRepository.#ctor(Lease.API.Data.LeaseDbContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentRepository class.
member.param: The database context to use for data access.

member.name: T:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository
member.summary: The interface for document repository, provides methods for getting, updating, adding and deleting a document

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository.GetDocuments
member.summary: Gets a list of all documents.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository.GetDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a specific document by its identifier.
member.returns: The document with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository.UpdateDocument(System.Guid,Lease.API.Entities.Document)
member.summary: Updates a specific document.
member.param: The identifier of the document to update.
The updated values for the document.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository.AddDocument(Lease.API.Entities.Document)
member.summary: Adds a new document.

member.name: M:Lease.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository.DeleteDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a specific document.
member.param: The identifier of the document to delete.

member.name: T:Lease.API.Models.DocumentGetResponseModel
member.summary: Represents a get response model for the document retrieval operation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the document.

member.name: P:Lease.API.Models.DocumentGetResponseModel.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the document, which is converted from JSON format using a custom converter.

member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the committee that the document belongs to.
Gets or sets the reference number of the document.

member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the document was submitted.
